Disassembly is a technical competition looking for spirited individuals with good Knowledge in electrical and electronics fields.
 Structure of Event:
 The Event has two initial rounds which are elimination rounds. The short-listed teams will be invited to participate in the final round in front of a panel of judges. Judgment will be on the basis of feasibility and originality.
 The activity comprises of two stages:
 Elimination Round
 It comprises of two basic rounds (Questionnaire and Circuit Debugging) to test the BASIC KNOWLEDGE of the Contestant in electrical and electronic subjects.
 Final Round
 Shortlisted teams will be invited to handling electronics equipment provided (e.g., a cd drive) under supervision of judges
 The team which completes the Task of Dissembling Assembling the given object, in least speculated time duration is considered as the Winner Team

• Number of participants in a team : Min - 2 ; Max - 3
 • The competition is open for students all circuit branches.
 • The decision of judges shall be final.
 • Kits will be provided for the last round.
 • The teams should submit their team name and team member’s names before the event starts.
 • Everyone should come up with their own and unique team names.
